60 class KobukiManager
61 {
62 public:
63  /*********************
64  ** C&D
65  **********************/
66  KobukiManager();
67  ~KobukiManager();
68  bool init();
69 
70  /*********************
71  ** Runtime
72  **********************/
73  void spin();
74 
75  /*********************
76  ** Callbacks
77  **********************/
78  void processStreamData();
79 
80  /*********************
81  ** Accessor
82  **********************/
83  ecl::LegacyPose2D<double> getPose();
84 
85 private:
86  double vx, wz;
87  ecl::LegacyPose2D<double> pose;
88  kobuki::Kobuki kobuki;
89  ecl::Slot<> slot_stream_data;
90 
91  double linear_vel_step, linear_vel_max;
92  double angular_vel_step, angular_vel_max;
93  std::string name;

96  ** Commands

117 /*****************************************************************************
118  ** Implementation
119  *****************************************************************************/
120 
124 KobukiManager::KobukiManager() :
125  linear_vel_step(0.05),
126  linear_vel_max(1.0),
127  angular_vel_step(0.33),
128  angular_vel_max(6.6),
129  quit_requested(false),
130  key_file_descriptor(0),
131  vx(0.0), wz(0.0),
132  slot_stream_data(&KobukiManager::processStreamData, *this)
133 {
134  tcgetattr(key_file_descriptor, &original_terminal_state); // get terminal properties
135 }
136 
137 KobukiManager::~KobukiManager()
138 {
139  kobuki.setBaseControl(0,0); // linear_velocity, angular_velocity in (m/s), (rad/s)
140  kobuki.disable();
141  tcsetattr(key_file_descriptor, TCSANOW, &original_terminal_state);
142 }
143 
147 bool KobukiManager::init()
148 {
149  /*********************
150  ** Parameters
151  **********************/
152  std::cout << "KobukiManager : using linear vel step [" << linear_vel_step << "]." << std::endl;
153  std::cout << "KobukiManager : using linear vel max [" << linear_vel_max << "]." << std::endl;
154  std::cout << "KobukiManager : using angular vel step [" << angular_vel_step << "]." << std::endl;
155  std::cout << "KobukiManager : using angular vel max [" << angular_vel_max << "]." << std::endl;
156 
157  /*********************
158  ** Velocities
159  **********************/
160  vx = 0.0;
161  wz = 0.0;
162 
163  /*********************
164  ** Kobuki
165  **********************/
166  kobuki::Parameters parameters;
167  parameters.sigslots_namespace = "/kobuki";
168  parameters.device_port = "/dev/kobuki";
169  parameters.enable_acceleration_limiter = true;
170 
171  kobuki.init(parameters);
172  kobuki.enable();
173  slot_stream_data.connect("/kobuki/stream_data");
174 
175  /*********************
176  ** Wait for connection
177  **********************/
178  thread.start(&KobukiManager::keyboardInputLoop, *this);
179  return true;
180 }
181 
182 /*****************************************************************************
183  ** Implementation [Spin]
184  *****************************************************************************/
185 
191 void KobukiManager::spin()
192 {
193 /*
194  {
195  // just in case we got here not via a keyboard quit request
196  quit_requested = true;
197  thread.cancel();
198  }
199 */
200  ecl::Sleep sleep(0.1);
201  while (!quit_requested){
202  sleep();
203  }
204  thread.join();
205 }
206 
207 /*****************************************************************************
208  ** Implementation [Keyboard]
209  *****************************************************************************/
210 
217 void KobukiManager::keyboardInputLoop()
218 {
219  struct termios raw;
220  memcpy(&raw, &original_terminal_state, sizeof(struct termios));
221 
222  raw.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
223  // Setting a new line, then end of file
224  raw.c_cc[VEOL] = 1;
225  raw.c_cc[VEOF] = 2;
226  tcsetattr(key_file_descriptor, TCSANOW, &raw);
227 
228  puts("Reading from keyboard");
229  puts("---------------------------");
230  puts("Forward/back arrows : linear velocity incr/decr.");
231  puts("Right/left arrows : angular velocity incr/decr.");
232  puts("Spacebar : reset linear/angular velocities.");
233  puts("q : quit.");
234  char c;
235  while (!quit_requested)
236  {
237  if (read(key_file_descriptor, &c, 1) < 0)
238  {
239  perror("read char failed():");
240  exit(-1);
241  }
242  processKeyboardInput(c);
243  }
244 }
245 
251 void KobukiManager::processKeyboardInput(char c)
252 {
253  /*
254  * Arrow keys are a bit special, they are escape characters - meaning they
255  * trigger a sequence of keycodes. In this case, 'esc-[-Keycode_xxx'. We
256  * ignore the esc-[ and just parse the last one. So long as we avoid using
257  * the last one for its actual purpose (e.g. left arrow corresponds to
258  * esc-[-D) we can keep the parsing simple.
259  */
260  switch (c)
261  {
262  case 68://kobuki_msgs::KeyboardInput::KeyCode_Left:
263  {
264  incrementAngularVelocity();
265  break;
266  }
267  case 67://kobuki_msgs::KeyboardInput::KeyCode_Right:
268  {
269  decrementAngularVelocity();
270  break;
271  }
272  case 65://kobuki_msgs::KeyboardInput::KeyCode_Up:
273  {
274  incrementLinearVelocity();
275  break;
276  }
277  case 66://kobuki_msgs::KeyboardInput::KeyCode_Down:
278  {
279  decrementLinearVelocity();
280  break;
281  }
282  case 32://kobuki_msgs::KeyboardInput::KeyCode_Space:
283  {
284  resetVelocity();
285  break;
286  }
287  case 'q':
288  {
289  quit_requested = true;
290  break;
291  }
292  default:
293  {
294  break;
295  }
296  }
297 }
298 
299 /*****************************************************************************
300  ** Implementation [Commands]
301  *****************************************************************************/
302 
306 void KobukiManager::incrementLinearVelocity()
307 {
308  if (vx <= linear_vel_max)
309  {
310  vx += linear_vel_step;
311  }
312 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("KeyOp: linear velocity incremented [" << cmd->linear.x << "|" << cmd->angular.z << "]");
313 }
314 
318 void KobukiManager::decrementLinearVelocity()
319 {
320  if (vx >= -linear_vel_max)
321  {
322  vx -= linear_vel_step;
323  }
324 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("KeyOp: linear velocity decremented [" << cmd->linear.x << "|" << cmd->angular.z << "]");
325 }
326 
330 void KobukiManager::incrementAngularVelocity()
331 {
332  if (wz <= angular_vel_max)
333  {
334  wz += angular_vel_step;
335  }
336 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("KeyOp: angular velocity incremented [" << cmd->linear.x << "|" << cmd->angular.z << "]");
337 }
338 
342 void KobukiManager::decrementAngularVelocity()
343 {
344  if (wz >= -angular_vel_max)
345  {
346  wz -= angular_vel_step;
347  }
348 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("KeyOp: angular velocity decremented [" << cmd->linear.x << "|" << cmd->angular.z << "]");
349 }
350 
351 void KobukiManager::resetVelocity()
352 {
353  vx = 0.0;
354  wz = 0.0;
355 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("KeyOp: reset linear/angular velocities.");
356 }
357 
358 void KobukiManager::processStreamData() {
359  ecl::LegacyPose2D<double> pose_update;
360  ecl::linear_algebra::Vector3d pose_update_rates;
361  kobuki.updateOdometry(pose_update, pose_update_rates);
362  pose *= pose_update;
363 // dx += pose_update.x();
364 // dth += pose_update.heading();
365  //std::cout << dx << ", " << dth << std::endl;
366  //std::cout << kobuki.getHeading() << ", " << pose.heading() << std::endl;
367  //std::cout << "[" << pose.x() << ", " << pose.y() << ", " << pose.heading() << "]" << std::endl;
368 
369  kobuki.setBaseControl(vx, wz);
370 }
371 
372 ecl::LegacyPose2D<double> KobukiManager::getPose() {
373  return pose;
374 }
375 
376 /*****************************************************************************
377 ** Signal Handler
378 *****************************************************************************/
379 
380 bool shutdown_req = false;
381 void signalHandler(int signum) {
382  shutdown_req = true;
383 }
384 
385 /*****************************************************************************
386 ** Main
387 *****************************************************************************/
388 
389 int main(int argc, char** argv)
390 {
391  signal(SIGINT, signalHandler);
392 
393  std::cout << "Simple Keyop : Utility for driving kobuki by keyboard." << std::endl;
394  KobukiManager kobuki_manager;
395  kobuki_manager.init();
396 
397  ecl::Sleep sleep(1);
398  ecl::LegacyPose2D<double> pose;
399  try {
400  while (!shutdown_req){
401  sleep();
402  pose = kobuki_manager.getPose();
403  std::cout << "current pose: [" << pose.x() << ", " << pose.y() << ", " << pose.heading() << "]" << std::endl;
404  }
405  } catch ( ecl::StandardException &e ) {
406  std::cout << e.what();
407  }
408  return 0;
409 }
